page-index-activity-description: Ethereum bụ ikpo okwu na-eduga maka iwepụta, ijikwa, na idozi akụ dijitalụ. Site na ego eji token mee na ngwaọrụ ego ruo n'ihe onwunwe ụwa na ahịa ndị na-apụta, Ethereum na-enye ntọala echekwara, nke na-anọpụ iche maka akụ na ụba dijitalụ.
page-index-activity-subtitle: Ihe omume na netwọk Ethereum Mainnet na Layer 2
page-index-bento-header: Ụzọ ọhụrụ isi jiri Internet mee ihe
page-index-bento-assets-content: Site na nka ruo n'ala na ụlọ ruo na mbak, enwere ike itinye akụ ọ bụla na token na Ethereum iji gosi na iji nyochaa nwe ya na dijitalụ. Zụọ, ree, zụọ ahịa, ma mepụta akụ na ihe nchịkọta—oge ọ bụla, ebe ọ bụla.
page-index-bento-dapps-content: Ngwa ndị e wuru na Ethereum na-arụ ọrụ n'ereghị data gị. Site na mgbasa ozi ọha na eze ruo na egwuregwu ruo n'ọrụ, jiri otu akaụntụ maka ngwa ọ bụla mepụtara ọhụrụ ma na-echekwa nzuzo na ohere.
page-index-bento-defi-content: Gbazinye ego, gbazinyere ego, nweta ọmụrụ nwa, na ihe ndị ọzọ, na-enweghị akaụntụ ụlọ akụ. Usoro ego enweghị etiti nke Ethereum na-emeghe 24/7 nye onye ọ bụla nwere njikọ ịntanetị.
page-index-bento-defi-title: Usoro ego mepere emepe maka mmadụ niile
page-index-bento-networks-content: Ọtụtụ narị netwọk Layer 2 ka e wuru na Ethereum. Nwee obi ụtọ na ụgwọ dị ala na azụmahịa ozugbo ma na-erite uru na nchekwa Ethereum egosipụtara.
page-index-bento-stablecoins-content: Stablecoins bụ ego ndị na-ejigide ọnụ ahịa kwụsiri ike, nke dabara na akụ kwụsiri ike dị ka dollar US. Nweta ịkwụ ụgwọ zuru ụwa ọnụ ozugbo ma ọ bụ chekwaa uru na dollar dijitalụ na Ethereum.
page-index-bento-stablecoins-title: Ego dijitalụ maka ojiji kwa ụbọchị
page-index-builders-description: Ethereum bụ ulo ebe obibi na gburugburu ebe obibi Web3 kachasị na onye nrụpụta kacha ewu ewu na gburugburu ebe obibi. Jiri asusu koputa JavaScript na Python, ma ọ bụ mụta asụsụ nkwekọrịta mara mma dị ka Solidity ma ọ bụ Vyper iji dee ngwa nke gị.
page-index-builders-header: Obodo onye na-ewu ihe kachasị ukwuu na Blockchain
page-index-community-description-1: Ebe nrụọrụ weebụ ethereum.org bụ nke ọtụtụ narị ndị ntụgharị asusu, ndị na-edepụta koodu, ndị na-emepụta ihe, ndị na-ede akwụkwọ, na ndị otu obodo nwere ịnụ ọkụ n'obi na eji ma n'edozi kwa ọnwa.
page-index-community-description-2: Bịa jụọ ajụjụ, jikọọ na ndị mmadụ gburugburu ụwa wee tinye aka na webụsaịtị. Ị ga-enweta ahụmahụ bara uru dị mkpa ma bụrụ onye nduzi n'oge usoro ahụ!
page-index-community-description-3: Obodo Ethereum.org bụ ebe kachasị mma ịmalite na ịmụta.
page-index-description: Ndi kachasi mma maka ngwa echeputara ohuru na netwọkụ blockchain
page-index-developers-code-example-descr: Wulite ụlọ akụ nke ihe nghota imeputara na-akwado
Mepụta akara ndị ị nwere ike ịnyefe ma jiri n'ofe ngwa
Jiri asụsụ ndị dị adị ka gị na Ethereum na ngwa ndị ọzọ na-akpakorita ihe
Chee echiche banyere ọrụ ndị dị ugbu a dị ka ihe nwere nchika oha, mepee ngwa
page-index-developers-code-example-title: Otu obere akpa ego JavaScript Ethereum
DNS mepere emepe na anaghị eji ikike
page-index-events-subtitle: Obodo ethereum na-akwado mmemme gburugburu ụwa niine, ogologo afọ niine
page-index-hero-image-alt: Ihe atụ nke obodo ọdịnihu, na-anọchite anya akụkụ nile mejụpụtara Ethereum.
page-index-join-action-contribute-descri: Chọpụta ụzọ niine dị iche iche ị nwere ike isi nyere ethereum.org aka itolite ma ka mma.
page-index-join-action-discord-descripti: Iji jụọ ajụjụ, hazie inye aka ma sonye na oku ogbe.
page-index-join-action-github-descriptio: Nye aka na koodu, imewe ihe, akụkọ, wdg
page-index-join-action-twitter-descripti: Iji nọgide na-enwe mmelite anyị na ozi dị mkpa
page-index-join-description: Ọtụtụ puku ndị ntụgharị, ndị na-ede koodu, ndị na-emepụta ihe, ndị na-ede ederede, na ndị otu obodo na-ewu ma na-echekwa webụsaịtị ethereum.org. Ị nwere ike ịtụpụta ndezigharị na ọdịnaya ọ bụla dị na saịtị mepere emepe a.
page-index-join-action-hub: Ebe ndị ntinye aka na ethereum.org
page-index-learn-description: Ethereum bụ netwọk blockchain enweghị etiti na ikpo okwu mmepe ngwanrọ, nke cryptocurrency ether (ETH) na-akwado. Ihe enyemaka ndị a bụ ụzọ gị iji jiri obi ike na-emegharị, ghọta, na iji Ethereum.
page-index-what-is-ethereum-description-: Ethereum bụ netwọk blockchain enweghị etiti, nke mepere emepe na ikpo okwu mmepe ngwanrọ, nke cryptocurrency ether (ETH) na-akwado. Ethereum bụ ntọala zuru ụwa ọnụ echekwara maka ọgbọ ọhụrụ nke ngwa ndị a na-apụghị ịkwụsị akwụsị.
Netwọk Ethereum ghe oghe maka onye ọ bụla: enweghị ikike achọrọ. O nweghị onye nwe ya, ọ bụkwa puku kwuru puku mmadụ, òtù, na ndị ọrụ gburugburu ụwa na-ewu ma na-echekwa ya.
page-index-what-is-ether-description-1: Ether (ETH) bụ cryptocurrency nke obodo na-akwado netwọk Ethereum, nke a na-eji akwụ ụgwọ azụmahịa ma chekwaa blockchain site na staking.
page-index-what-is-ether-description-2: E wezụga ọrụ teknụzụ ya, ETH bụ ego dijitalụ mepere emepe, nke enwere ike ịhazi. A na-eji ya maka ịkwụ ụgwọ zuru ụwa ọnụ, dị ka ihe nkwado maka mgbazinye ego, na dị ka ụlọ ahịa bara uru nke na-adabereghị na ụlọ ọrụ ọ bụla etiti.
page-index-meta-description: Ethereum bu ụzọ zuru ụwa nile, nke akwadopụtàrà maka ego na ụdịrị ngwa kòmpụtà ọhụrụ. Na Ethereum, ị nwere ike ide koodù na-achịkwa ego, ma ruo ngwa kòmpụtà ndị enwere ike inweta ebe ọ bụla n’ ụwa.
page-index-meta-title: Ethereum.org: Ntụziaka zụrụ ezu màkà Ethereum
page-index-network-stats-total-value-hel: Mkpokọta ọnụ ahịa ejidere na Ethereum
page-index-popular-topics-action: Ntuziaka ndị ọzọ na Ethereum Learn Hub
page-index-popular-topics-start: Ntuziaka Ethereum nke nzọụkwụ site na nzọụkwụ
page-index-popular-topics-wallets: Kedu ihe bụ obere akpa ego crypto?
page-index-posts-subtitle: Blọọgụ kacha ọhụrụ na mmelite sitere na obodo
page-index-values-ownership-legacy-conte: Site na ụlọ akụ ma ọ bụ usoro mgbasa ozi, ụlọ ọrụ ahụ na-ejikwa akụ na data gị. Ị na-adabere na ha maka ịnweta na ịchịkwa
Ha nwere ike iji data gị n'ụzọ ị gaghị ekweta, dabere na atumatu ha.
page-index-values-ownership-ethereum-con: Na Ethereum, naanị ị nwere ohere na njikwa. Ọ dịghị onye ọzọ ga-enwe ike iji akụ gị. Ị nwere ike ikpebi onye ị ga-enye ikike ahụ.
page-index-values-fairness-legacy-conten: Taa, ọ bụghị onye ọ bụla nwere ohere ịnweta ọrụ ego. Ụfọdụ ndị mmadụ nwere ike inwe ihe mgbochi n'ihi ọnọdụ ha ma ọ bụ obodo ha.
page-index-values-fairness-ethereum-cont: Anyị kwenyere na a ga-ahapụ onye ọ bụla ka ọ rite uru na usoro zuru ụwa ọnụ. Ọ bụ ya mere Ethereum na-enye ohere nha anya na ụwa niile, n'agbanyeghị onye ị bụ ma ọ bụ ebe ị si.
page-index-values-privacy-legacy-content: Anyị enweghị ike ịtụ anya na gọọmentị, ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ ụlọ ọrụ ndị ọzọ buru ibu, na-enweghị ihu ka ha enye anyị nzuzo n'ihi uru ha bara.
Ọtụtụ ngwa na-enwere ozi nkeonwe gị dịka o kwere ha mee ka ha nwee ike iji ahịa ahaziri ahazi lekwasịrị gị anya.
page-index-values-privacy-ethereum-conte: Otu Ethereum na-akwanyere nzuzo ùgwù. Ị nwere ikike iji ngwa mee ihe na-ekpugheghị onwe gị ma ọ bụ ozi ị̄kpọtụrụ gị.
page-index-values-integration-legacy-con: Ọtụtụ ngwa na-akpali gị ịmepụta akaụntụ dị iche iche, na-eme ya ka ọ sie ike icheta nkọwa nbanye na ndebanye aha gị niile.
page-index-values-integration-ethereum-c: Site na iji Ethereum ị nwere ike iji otu akaụntụ na ngwa niile. Enweghị ndebanye aha onye ọ bụla achọrọ.
page-index-values-decentralization-legac: Ndị nwe ụlọ ọrụ bụ ndị ọchụnta ego na ndị nwere òkè. Ọ bụ nanị ha na-achịkwa ụlọ ọrụ ahụ ma na-erite uru dị site n'ihe ịga nke ọma ya.
page-index-values-decentralization-ether: Dị ka ịntanetị n'onwe ya, Ethereum abụghị nke onye ọ bụla. A na-ekekọrịta ya na mmadu niile na-ekekwa ya. Ọ nweghị otu onye nwe ya nwere ike ịchịkwa ya.
page-index-values-censorship-legacy-cont: Ebe ime ihe nke oge a na iwu ya na-agbanwekarị. Ndị nwere mmasị, ndị isi ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ ọbụnadi ọchịchị n'emegbu emegbu pụrụ imetụta ha.
page-index-values-censorship-ethereum-co: Iguzogide mmegbu bụ isi ụkpụrụ nke Ethereum. Ọrụ ya kwesịrị ịdị na-akwụwa aka ọtọ na enweghị ele mmadụ anya n'ihu mgbe niile.
Enweghị ike ịchịkwa Ethereum site na Mba, ụlọ ọrụ ma ọ bụ onye ọ bụla.
page-index-values-open-legacy-content-0: Ụlọ ọrụ na-echekwa ihe onwunwe ọgụgụ isi ha, anaghị ekekọrịta ya. Ọnweghị onye nọ n'azụ ụlọ ọrụ ahụ nwere ike ịhụ ka ihe si arụ ọrụ, dozie nsogbu, ma ọ bụ mee nkwalite. O na-esiri ndị mmadụ ike ịmepụta ngwaọrụ ọhụrụ ma ọ bụ hazie.
page-index-values-open-ethereum-content-: Ethereum bụ maka ọha mmadụ niile. Onye ọ bụla nwere ike ịhụ, jiri, ma melite koodu ahụ, na-eme ka ọ dị mma maka onye ọ bụla.
page-index-fusaka-description: Maka netwọk Ethereum ngwa ngwa, dị nchebe, na nke na-adịrị ndị ọrụ mfe |
